backend/main.mo: Manages presale state, tracks ICP contributions and allocations, enforces cap rules, and exposes query methods for status and contributor data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a music replacement change and the files, components, and tests involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes with global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all presale sections and includes animated background effects and the background music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: Floating controller that manages play, mute, volume, and error display for background music.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributors in a styled table with loading skeleton and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Neon-styled countdown timer showing hours, minutes, and seconds from a 24‑hour hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the presale deposit address with clipboard copy functionality and feedback.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Displays the main hero area with an image, animated title, tagline, and three feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains presale contribution steps and shows key details using constants like the deposit address and cap.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Fetches presale status and shows progress, ICP totals, remaining cap, and an end-of-presale badge.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress display, and deposit address into a single status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Presents tokenomics data and a FAQ section using constants such as max supply.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, hard cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Manages background music playback, preferences, autoplay handling, and user interaction unblock logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Periodically fetches all contributors from the backend actor using react-query polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a 24-hour countdown timer with hours, minutes, and seconds updated every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context/provider and hook, handling AuthClient creation, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch and poll the presale status from the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom neon-themed styles, animations, and color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles loading and saving background music preferences and opt‑in flags via localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contribution data by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers using German-style thousands separators for ICP values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Stores overall project state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the presale website.
